Room.Name: Starrine's Armor Shoppe
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered Louis Brandywine Starrine's armor shoppe.
Room.LongDescription: As you walk through the door, you notice attractive pieces of small armor hung on pegs all about the room. Behind a counter in the back of the shoppe stands a swarthy little man who looks as if he's probably killed a few dragons in his day. He only sells armor for small races.
